quote: The rage that had expolded inside me diffused. I didn't know where it had come from. I had a short temper and often acted impulsively,but this had been intense and ugly even for me. Weird.
quote_letters: THE RAGE THAT HAD EXPOLDED INSIDE ME DIFFUSED I DIDNT KNOW WHERE IT HAD COME FROM I HAD A SHORT TEMPER AND OFTEN ACTED IMPULSIVELYBUT THIS HAD BEEN INTENSE AND UGLY EVEN FOR ME WEIRD
